mapper.select: SELECT p.prcs_prod_code, p.prod_code, c.prod_name, p.prcs_code, m.prcs_name, p.prcs_seq FROM prcs_prod p JOIN com_prod c ON p.prod_code = c.prod_code JOIN prcs_manage m ON p.prcs_code = m.prcs_code where p.prod_code = #{prodCode} ORDER BY prcs_prod_code
SELECT prod_code, prod_name FROM com_prod WHERE prod_kind = 'C'
